japanese: よぉ、待たせたな。
translation: Hey, sorry to have kept you waiting.
Huh?

japanese:
ええ～？
なんでここに来てるのさ、フータロー君。
translation:
Ooh?
Why are you here, Futaro-kun?

japanese: なんでって、そりゃ――
translation: Why? I mean%p-2;――

japanese:
あ！　さては行き先を間違えちゃった？
五月ちゃんの話、ちゃんと聞いてなかったんでしょ？
ダメだなぁ。
translation:
Oh! Did you perhaps come to the wrong place?
You didn't listen carefully to what Itsuki-chan said,
did you? You're hopeless.

japanese: おい、一花。
translation: Hey, Ichika.

japanese:
それとも、もう誰かに告白した後？
君のことだから、全員に会っておこうなんて
余計なことを考えてるんじゃない？
translation:
Or did you confess to someone else already?
Knowing you, you're probably thinking
of meeting everyone, just to be safe.

japanese: 一花！
translation: Ichika!

japanese: ……なに？
translation: ...What?

japanese:
間違えてなんてねぇし最初にここに来た。
お前に会いに来たんだ、一花。
translation:
I didn't come here by mistake.
I came to see you, Ichika.

japanese:
なに言ってるの？
そんなわけないじゃん。
translation:
What are you talking about?
That doesn't make any sense.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
やっぱり誰かと間違えたんでしょ？
変に誤魔化すことないって。
ほら、お姉さんが案内してあげる！
translation:
Did you mistake me for someone else, after all?
Don't try to weirdly cover it up.
Look, I'll guide you!

japanese:
それで？　誰に会いたいの？
二乃はうちのクラスの教室に――
translation:
So? Who do you want to see?
Nino's in our classroom%p-2;――

japanese: 一花！！
translation: ICHIKA!!

japanese: っ！

もう一度言う。
俺は、お前に会いに来た。
translation:
I'll say it once again.
I came here to see you.

japanese: お前のことが好きだ、一花。
translation: I like you, Ichika.

japanese: だからさ、なに言ってるの？
translation: Oh come on, what are you saying?

japanese: なにって。
translation: What do you mean?

japanese:
わけわかんないっ！　意味わかんない！！
なんで私なの！？　なんで！！
translation:
I don't get it! I don't get it at all!
Why me?! Why?!

japanese: フータロー君、おかしいよっ！
translation: You're crazy, Futaro-kun!

japanese:
……はあ？
俺が、おかしいだと？
translation:
Huh?
I'm crazy, you say?

japanese:
いいだろう。
だったら、お前が納得いくように
説明してやろうじゃないか。
translation:
Okay, then.
Let me explain it to you so that you can understand.

japanese: なにをさ。
translation: Explain what?

japanese:
お前のどこが好きかってことに決まってんだろ。
俺がおかしくないと実感できるよう、
じっくり聞かせてやる。
translation:
What I like about you is obvious, isn't it?
So that you can feel that I'm not crazy,
I'll take my time and tell you.
Huh...?

japanese:
俺はお前の、夢や自分自身のために
強くあろうとする姿を、ずっと見てきた。
translation:
I've always watched you trying to be strong
for your dreams and your own self.

japanese:
お前はいつだって先を行ってる。
そういう背中に追いつきたいし、
一緒にいたいって思った。
translation:
You're always ahead of the game.
I thought, I wanted to catch up to you
so I could be with you.

japanese:
あとな、そのくせ無理をしたり
自分を追い詰めてしまうような弱い姿も知ってるぞ。
だから――
translation:
Also, I know the weak side of you
that pushes yourself too hard, corners yourself.
So%p-2;――

japanese: だから、止めときなよ。
translation: So, you'd better stop.

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
自分のために強くあるって言ってくれたけど、
そんなの、できてない。
私はみんなよりも、弱くてずるい。
translation:
You said I want to be strong for myself,
but I just can't. I'm weaker, so I have to be
more cunning than everyone else.

japanese:
そういう私は君を不幸にしかしないからさ、
止めときなって。
translation:
I'll only make you unhappy.
So, you'd better stop, I say.

japanese: 俺を舐めるなよ、一花。
translation: Don't underestimate me, Ichika.
Huh...?

japanese:
お前がなにを考えてそこまで言ってんのかは
知らねぇし、不幸にするとかしないとか、
そんな先のことも知らん！
translation:
I don't really know what you're thinking to say,
or whether you're going to make me unhappy or not.
I don't know what the future holds!

japanese:
ただお前が不安に思う必要なんてねぇ。
俺が、お前の不安を癒やせるようになるからな。
translation:
But you don't have to worry about anything.
Because I'll be able to heal your anxieties.

japanese:
そうなりゃ不幸もなにもない。
違うか？
translation:
Then there won't be any problems, right?
Don't you agree?

japanese: ……強引な理論だなぁ。
translation: That's a pushy argument...

japanese:
一花。
いまの、お前の気持ちを聞かせてくれ。
translation:
Ichika.
Let me hear how you feel right now.

japanese: 私は……。
私は、君を好きになってもいいんだね。
translation: It's okay for me to love you, isn't it?

japanese:
俺はいままで、
お前につらい思いをさせて来たと思う。
本当にすまん。
translation:
I think I've caused you so much pain.
I'm really sorry.

japanese: ううん……そんなこと……。
translation: No...that's...

japanese: あるだろ？
translation: It's true, isn't it?

japanese: ……自覚してるの、ずるくない？
translation: That's...not fair...

japanese:
まったくだ。
ただ、もうこうやって泣かせたりしねぇ。
translation:
You're right.
But I won't make you cry like this anymore.

japanese:
これはいままでとは全然違うよ。
嬉し涙だから。
translation:
This is completely different from before.
These are tears of joy.

japanese: そうか。
translation: Is that so?

japanese:
フータロー君。
私も、君が好き。
translation:
Futaro-kun.
I love you.

japanese: 君のことが、ずっと好きだったの……。
translation: I've always loved you...
